message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it to be a game-changer. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1500000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a fair price for the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $1200000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product.

I understand you're still trying to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I think $1150000 is the minimum I can go. I believe the product's value justifies this price, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.
I'm getting closer to a price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I think $1150000 is the lowest I can go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.
I'm trying to find a mutually agreeable price. I'm willing to pay $1075000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1075000. I'm thinking we're getting close to the product's true value, so I'm willing to meet you at $1100000. However, I want to make it clear that this is my final concession, and I expect you to meet me at this price.
